question: You are taking a course at a local college. The deadline for your project was last week but you haven't finished it.Write a letter to your lecturer. In your letterintroduce yourselfexplain why you haven't handed in the project yetrequest more time to do it.
text: I am Lorenzo and I am a sophomore in this college. I am studying Marketing majors and also attending your classes on Consumer Behaviour. I am writing to you because I won't be able to submit my assignment given by you in the last lecture within the stipulated deadline.

Please allow me to explain my situation in detail. As you would see from the attendance records, I was not able to attend any classes for the last 2 weeks. The reason being I was diagnosed with COVID-19 and was hospitalised for 1 week. After getting discharged, the doctors still recommended staying quarantined for one more week. Due to this, I missed all my lectures.

I have managed to get notes from my peers and have already started with the reading list. I would ,however, need some more time to get a complete understanding of the topics before I start with my assignments. Therefore, I request you to kindly consider my case and extend the deadline for my submissions by at least one week.
